title: Bear Brown's Ex Shows Off 'Alaskan Bush' Baby Bump
text:
The "Alaskan Bush People" stars better start making room for one more cub to join the pack, because that time is coming sooner than many expected.

Bear Brown's former fiancée, Raiven Adams, showed off her growing baby bump on Sunday morning and revealed that she's already 8 weeks along.

Related:

Bear Brown's Ex Fiancée Explains Sexuality After Pregnancy News Backlash

'Alaskan Bush People' Star Bear Brown Separated From Fiancée On 'Good Terms'

Bear Brown's Fiancée Calls Off Her Engagement To The 'Alaskan Bush People' Star

'Alaskan Bush People': Matt Brown Reportedly Met With Dad Billy, May Return To Show

View photos

Wearing a red dress against a wooden backdrop, Raiven Adams cradled her belly while showing off her cute little bump.

She captioned the photo with a string of baby-related emojis.

View photos

As we reported, Raiven and Bear recently ended their short-lived engagement, but it was then revealed, "Quickly after deciding friendship was best for us! We found out we had a little surprise coming our way."

Since the breakup, Raiven has defended her relationship with the "Alaskan Bush People" star, especially since she considers herself a lesbian.

View photos

"When me and bear first talked, he knew and announced I was 100% gay," Raiven revealed, explaining that Bear, "Asked me to come hang out as a friend and I did. He had a great personality! And we attempted to date because we wanted to see where it would go."
